metadata.description: A collection of custom Claude Code skills and agents

plugins.name: toolbox
plugins.description: Skills and commands for prompt engineering, MCP servers, subagents, hooks, and productivity workflows

plugins.name: locale-mcp-server
plugins.description: MCP server for locale translations REST API (stable - only updates when server changes)

plugins.name: locale-translations
plugins.description: Skills, commands, and agent for managing locale translations (requires locale-mcp-server)
